nodes.text: A Naboo Resistance base was established in the Naboo training canyon during the Invasion of Naboo in 32 BBY. The base had a number of tents for its personnel, two hospitals, and laser turrets for defense. Rhys Dallows agreed to deliver supplies to the base. He escorted Reti through the canyon and assisted in the resistance in fighting off a large Trade Federation force.

A Naboo Resistance base was was established in the Naboo training canyon after the start of the Invasion of Naboo in 32 BBY. The base consisted of a number of tents, two hospitals, and a number of laser turretss for defense.

After the Trade Federation occupied the planet Naboo, the resistance, formed from the Royal Naboo Security Forces, established the base. Bravo Twelve and Bravo Eight were among the forces stationed there. After his return to Naboo, Bravo Squadron pilot Rhys Dallows agreed to transport captured munitions to the base. When he arrived at the canyon, his escorts were not there, so he led Reti, carrying the munitions in his starship Zoomer, into the canyon. They found the escorts in a dogfight with Scarab starfighters. Together they finished off the Scarabs and continued onto the base, which had fallen under attack by a large force of Trade Federation Multi-Troop Transports and Armored Assault Tanks. The resistance fighters destroyed the Droid Army forces and saved the base.
The resistance base appears in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Starfighter. It is also mentioned in the game's strategy guide.
